summary:
As a Social Psychologist, I am passionate about understanding the complexities of human behavior and how it impacts our society. With more than 10 months of experience in Human Resources, I have gained valuable insights into the workings of organizations and how they can promote a positive work culture. My expertise in public peace and reconciliation policies has also given me a deeper understanding of the importance of building strong and inclusive communities.

My approach to psychology is rooted in evidence-based practices and a deep commitment to understanding the unique needs of each individual. I strive to create a safe and supportive environment for my clients, where they can explore their thoughts and emotions in a non-judgmental setting.

Whether you're an individual seeking guidance on personal issues or an organization looking to improve your workplace culture, I am here to help. Let's work together to create a brighter future for all.

education.field_of_study: Psicología social para la comunidad, investigación y psicolgía educativa

profile_positions.description:
As a DEGIS Seedbed Researcher at GIDEUS, I had the opportunity to work on a range of research projects focused on understanding the complex dynamics of social identity and its impact on individuals and communities. During my three years of work experience, I was responsible for the following obligations:

- Conducting literature reviews and analyzing existing research on social identity and its effects on individual and collective behavior
- Developing research proposals and designing studies to investigate the relationship between social identity and various social, political, and economic factors
- Collecting and analyzing data using a variety of quantitative and qualitative research methods, including surveys, interviews, focus groups, and content analysis
- Collaborating with other researchers, community members, and organizations to ensure that research findings are relevant and impactful
- Disseminating research findings through publications, presentations, and other means to inform policy and practice

Through my work at Corporación Universitaria El Minuto de Dios as a DEGIS Seedbed Researcher at GIDEUS, I gained valuable skills in research design, data collection and analysis, and collaboration. I also developed a deeper understanding of the complex interplay between social identity and various social, political, and economic factors. Overall, my three years of work experience were a transformative and rewarding experience that solidified my commitment to using research to create positive change in the world.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

company.name: Corporación Organización El Minuto de Dios

profile_positions.company: Corporación Organización El Minuto de Dios
profile_positions.description:
As a practitioner at Corporación Organización Minuto de Dios, I had the opportunity to apply my academic knowledge in a practical setting, working with individuals and communities to create positive change. During my year of work experience, I was responsible for the following obligations:

- Conducting research on various social issues to inform the development of intervention programs
- Collaborating with community members, organizations, and local government officials to identify needs and develop solutions
- Facilitating group sessions and individual counseling to promote mental health and well-being
- Planning and implementing educational workshops and training sessions on topics such as conflict resolution, leadership development, and community engagement
- Participating in team meetings and consultations to discuss progress, challenges, and opportunities for growth

Through my work at Corporación Organización Minuto de Dios, I gained valuable skills in program development, community engagement, and counseling. I also developed a deeper understanding of the importance of cultural sensitivity and inclusivity in working with diverse populations. Overall, my year of work experience was a transformative and rewarding experience that solidified my commitment to promoting social justice and equity.
profile_positions.title: Psychologist Practitioner
